alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Randolph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 3:21PM EST until January 29 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Edwardsport. Mississinewa River near Ridgeville. .Brief flooding is expected along the White River at Edwardsport and Mississinea River near Ridgeville with more widespread flooding expected elsewhere across central Indiana. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississinewa River near Ridgeville. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Lowland agricultural flooding along CR 100 W just north of the river. High water affecting a small portion of River Road just east of SR 1 and north of the river. Water is within a few feet vertically of the approaches to SR 1 bridge in western Randolph county. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM EST Sunday the stage was 9.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 10.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued late tonight by around 500 AM EST /400 AM CST/.
